H0.text: what are the important holidays of islam. Eid al-Fitr

H1.text: what are the important holidays of islam. Eid al-Adha

H2.text: what are the important holidays of islam. Laylat al-Mi'raj

H3.text: what are the important holidays of islam. Ramadan

A4.text: Eid al-Fitr is celebrated at the end of Ramadan (a month of fasting during daylight hours)

A5.text: Muslims celebrate when they believe the Quran was first revealed to Muhammed by fasting from dawn to sunset during Ramadan, the ninth month of the Islamic calendar

A6.text: Eid al-Fitr is celebrated for one to three days, depending on the country.

A7.text: Eid al-Fitr is the first of the two main festivals in Islam, the other being Eid al-Adha.
